text:
Not sure this should be posted here, but I just saw an odd:
``` Activating environment at `~/Projects/XXXX/Project.toml`
   Updating registry at `~/.julia/registries/General`
ERROR: LoadError: LoadError: expected package `ThreadingUtilities [8290d209]` to be registered```
while instantiating a project on a cluster. Not sure I will be able to reproduce, but thought I should ask around ti try and understand what this is due to?

elements.text: Not sure this should be posted here, but I just saw an odd:

Activating environment at `~/Projects/XXXX/Project.toml`
   Updating registry at `~/.julia/registries/General`
ERROR: LoadError: LoadError: expected package `ThreadingUtilities [8290d209]` to be registered
while instantiating a project on a cluster. Not sure I will be able to reproduce, but thought I should ask around ti try and understand what this is due to?

text: FWIW, I don't directly use ThreadingUtilities, I think it comes from the dependency "chain" (not sure how to call this): DiffEqBase -> RecursiveFactorization -> LoopVectorization -> ThreadingUtilities.
